ValidationRule.description: When Opportunity is in stage Lost with Loss Reason = Depending on Parent Company decision, to ask for the Parent Account field to be field in, on the account level.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(plLossReason__c, "Dependent on decision at different corporate level"), ISBLANK( Account.ParentId ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To use this loss reason, make sure that the Account of this Opportunity has a Parent Account indicated. Please add a Parent Account and then come back to the Opportunity to close it as lost.
